20101222010019.000|20101222010019.000|CC1|COME.

20101222010714.000|20101222010716.000|CC1|CREWS STILL REMOVING THE JUMBLE 
20101222010716.000|20101222010718.000|CC1|OF DOWNED LINES AND BROKEN POLES
20101222010718.000|20101222010722.000|CC1|WHICH PROVED NO MATCH FOR A     
20101222010722.000|20101222010725.000|CC1|SOGGY EUCALYPTUS TREE.          
20101222010725.000|20101222010726.000|CC1|A MAJOR ROAD CLOSURE, DOWNED    
20101222010726.000|20101222010728.000|CC1|POWER LINES, NO ELECTRICITY.    
20101222010728.000|20101222010731.000|CC1|BLAME IT ON A EUCALYPTUS TREE   
20101222010731.000|20101222010733.000|CC1|SOAKED WITH RAIN GAVE UP AND    
20101222010733.000|20101222010735.000|CC1|CAME TOPPLING DOWN ON THE POWER 
20101222010735.000|20101222010735.000|CC1|LINES.                          
20101222010735.000|20101222010738.000|CC1|>> CAME DOWN, AND OF COURSE, THE
20101222010738.000|20101222010740.000|CC1|WEEPING OF THE CABLES ON THE    
20101222010740.000|20101222010741.000|CC1|GROUND, YOU KNOW, AND THE SPARKS
20101222010741.000|20101222010743.000|CC1|EVERYWHERE AND THEN THESE CAME  
20101222010743.000|20101222010748.000|CC1|DOWN AND THESE CAME DOWN AND -- 
20101222010748.000|20101222010748.000|CC1|JUST WOW.                       
20101222010748.000|20101222010750.000|CC1|THERE WERE HUGE EXPLOSIONS AND  
20101222010750.000|20101222010751.000|CC1|IT SOUNDED LIKE TREES CRASHING. 
20101222010751.000|20101222010753.000|CC1|THE SKY WAS LIT UP AND IT SCARED
20101222010753.000|20101222010754.000|CC1|THE CHILDREN TO DEATH.          
20101222010754.000|20101222010755.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE ALL CONNECTED.       
20101222010755.000|20101222010757.000|CC1|AND THEY PULL DOWN.             
20101222010757.000|20101222010759.000|CC1|>> SO LIKE DOMINOS TOPPLING?    
20101222010759.000|20101222010800.000|CC1|>> EXACTLY.                     
20101222010800.000|20101222010802.000|CC1|>> Reporter: EDISON'S DONNA LEE 
20101222010802.000|20101222010807.000|CC1|TOLD US THE POOLS ALONG THE     
20101222010807.000|20101222010810.000|CC1|CLAREMONT STRETCH OF THE ROAD   
20101222010810.000|20101222010813.000|CC1|CARRY HIGH VOLT AJS TRANSMISSION
20101222010813.000|20101222010814.000|CC1|LINES.

20101222010824.000|20101222010825.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NEIGHBORS SAID THE 
20101222010825.000|20101222010830.000|CC1|POWER POLES WERE INSTALLED A    
20101222010830.000|20101222010831.000|CC1|DECADE AGO WHEN BASELINE WAS    
20101222010831.000|20101222010832.000|CC1|WIDENED.                        
20101222010832.000|20101222010833.000|CC1|THE UTILITY PLANS TO USE WOOD,  
20101222010833.000|20101222010835.000|CC1|AGAIN, NOT METAL, TO REPLACE THE
20101222010835.000|20101222010836.000|CC1|SNAPPED POLES.                  
20101222010836.000|20101222010838.000|CC1|>> THIS IS AN UNUSUAL

20101222010840.000|20101222010841.000|CC1|OF RAIN WE HAVEN'T HAD IN MANY  
20101222010841.000|20101222010841.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20101222010841.000|20101222010843.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WITH THE GROUND IN 
20101222010843.000|20101222010845.000|CC1|AND VULNERABLE TREES SATURATING 
20101222010845.000|20101222010846.000|CC1|AND MORE RAIN ON THE WAY,       
20101222010846.000|20101222010848.000|CC1|UTILITIES WORRY MORE LINES COULD
20101222010848.000|20101222010849.000|CC1|BE BROUGHT DOWN IN THE NEXT 24

20101222011611.000|20101222011614.000|CC1|THE MOST UNSTABLE OF THE ENTIRE 
20101222011614.000|20101222011614.000|CC1|WEEK.

20101222011615.000|20101222011616.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY WE'RE GOING TO GET   
20101222011616.000|20101222011618.000|CC1|PERIODS OF NOT ONLY HEAVY RAIN  
20101222011618.000|20101222011619.000|CC1|BUT THUNDERSTORMS THAT CAN HAVE 
20101222011619.000|20101222011620.000|CC1|TWICE THE AMOUNT OF RAIN THAT   
20101222011620.000|20101222011622.000|CC1|OTHER AREAS WILL HAVE, ALONG    
20101222011622.000|20101222011624.000|CC1|WITH HAIL AND SOME VERY, VERY   
20101222011624.000|20101222011626.000|CC1|GUSTY WINDS.

20101222012412.000|20101222012414.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DOCTORS DIAGNOSED  
20101222012414.000|20101222012418.000|CC1|HER WITH MOMMY THUMB, A REAL

20101222012426.000|20101222012428.000|CC1|THEIR CHILD, THEY HAVE FLUID

20101222012432.000|20101222012433.000|CC1|IN AND WE SEE A LOT OF IT.      
20101222012433.000|20101222012435.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE CONDITION HAS  
20101222012435.000|20101222012436.000|CC1|BEEN AROUND FOR AS LONG AS      
20101222012436.000|20101222012437.000|CC1|PARENTS LIFTED THEIR CHILDREN.  
20101222012437.000|20101222012439.000|CC1|NOW THE NUMBER OF CASES ARE     
20101222012439.000|20101222012440.000|CC1|SHOOTING UP.                    
20101222012440.000|20101222012440.000|CC1|WHY?                            
20101222012440.000|20101222012442.000|CC1|DOCTORS SAY A COMBINATION OF    
20101222012442.000|20101222012444.000|CC1|HEAVIER CHILDREN, OLDER NEW     
20101222012444.000|20101222012447.000|CC1|MOTHERS, CRIBS LOWER TO THE     
20101222012447.000|20101222012448.000|CC1|FLOOR, AND FREQUENT SCROLLING ON
20101222012448.000|20101222012450.000|CC1|SMART PHONES ARE PUTTING THE    
20101222012450.000|20101222012452.000|CC1|THUMBS OUT OF ALIGNMENT WITH THE
20101222012452.000|20101222012454.000|CC1|REST OF THE HAND.               
20101222012454.000|20101222012456.000|CC1|>> IT'S THE INFORMATION, THE    
20101222012456.000|20101222012458.000|CC1|TISSUE AROUND THE TENDON, I     
20101222012458.000|20101222012459.000|CC1|DON'T RECOMMEND TRYING TO LIVE  
20101222012459.000|20101222012500.000|CC1|WITH THE PROBLEM.               
20101222012500.000|20101222012502.000|CC1|RARELY WILL IT END ON ITS OWN.  
20101222012502.000|20101222012504.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ORTHOPEDIC SURGEONS
20101222012504.000|20101222012506.000|CC1|ESTIMATE BETWEEN ONE QUARTER AND
20101222012506.000|20101222012507.000|CC1|ONE-HALF OF ALL NEW MOTHERS     
20101222012507.000|20101222012509.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE SYMPTOMS OF MOMMY    
20101222012509.000|20101222012509.000|CC1|THUMB.                          
20101222012509.000|20101222012510.000|CC1|THE TREATMENT?                  
20101222012510.000|20101222012512.000|CC1|ICE AND ANTI-INFLAMMATORIES,    
20101222012512.000|20101222012513.000|CC1|PILLS OR INJECTIONS.            
20101222012513.000|20101222012515.000|CC1|SURGERY FOR THE REALLY SEVERE   
20101222012515.000|20101222012515.000|CC1|CASES.                          
20101222012515.000|20101222012517.000|CC1|IN JENNIFER'S CASE, SHE WORE A  
20101222012517.000|20101222012520.000|CC1|WRIST BRACE THAT INCLUDED A     
20101222012520.000|20101222012522.000|CC1|THUMB SPRINT WHICH RESTED THE   
20101222012522.000|20101222012524.000|CC1|TENDON AND REDUCES SWELLING.    
20101222012524.000|20101222012527.000|CC1|>> I WORE THAT OFF AND ON FOR   
20101222012527.000|20101222012530.000|CC1|ABOUT TWO WEEKS, AND AYE NEVER  
20101222012530.000|20101222012532.000|CC1|HAD HAD A PROBLEM WITH IT SENSE.
20101222012532.000|20101222012534.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T AFFORD IT BY LIFTING  
20101222012534.000|20101222012537.000|CC1|THE BABY WITHOUT SQUEEZING THE  
20101222012537.000|20101222012537.000|CC1|THUMB.                          
20101222012537.000|20101222012539.000|CC1|MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO GET MOMMY
20101222012539.000|20101222012543.000|CC1|THUMBS ARE MOMS, NOT DADS.      
20101222012543.000|20101222012546.000|CC1|MOMS DO MOST OF THE LIFTING.    
20101222012546.000|20101222012549.000|CC1|GRANDPARENTS AND NANNIES CAN GET
20101222012549.000|20101222012553.000|CC1|IT, TOO, GO TO THE DOCTOR IF YOU
20101222012553.000|20101222012556.000|CC1|HAVE THOSE SYMPTOMS.            
20101222012556.000|20101222012558.000|CC1|GO TO NBCLA.COM, THE KEY WORD   
20101222012558.000|20101222012558.000|CC1|MOMMY THUMB.

20101222013516.000|20101222013516.000|CC1|WHOLE.

20101222014538.000|20101222014538.000|CC1|       Words of good cheer,     
20101222014538.000|20101222014541.000|CC1|        From everywhere, ?      
20101222014541.000|20101222014541.000|CC1|        ? Filling the air,      
20101222014541.000|20101222014541.000|CC1|        Oh how they pound,      
20101222014541.000|20101222014544.000|CC1|       Raising the sound, ?     
20101222014544.000|20101222014544.000|CC1|      ? O'er hill and dale,     
20101222014544.000|20101222014544.000|CC1|       Telling their tale,      
20101222014544.000|20101222014547.000|CC1|        Gaily they ring, ?

20101222015831.000|20101222015834.000|CC1|DID IN CLAREMONT.
